channel.title: Comments for Computer Repair Doctor

item.title: Comment on Computer Repair Doctor is opening soon! by Annette N.
item.dc:creator: Annette N.
item.description: Thanks again for doing a great job on my laptop. It works like it did when it was new. I'm glad I found you! Annette N.
item.content:encoded: Thanks again for doing a great job on my laptop. It works like it did when it was new. I’m glad I found you! Annette N.
